clinical_study.brief_title: Neoadjuvant SLOT Versus SOX in Patients With Locally Advanced, Resectable Gastric/Esophagogastric Junction (EGJ) Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Neoadjuvant S1, Oxaliplatin, and Docetaxel (SLOT) Versus S1, Oxaliplatin(SOX) in Patients With Locally Advanced, Resectable Gastric/Esophagogastric Junction (EGJ) Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: gastric cancer is a highly aggressive malignancy with a poor overall outcome. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the 5-year survival of neoadjuvant S1, oxaliplatin, and docetaxel (SLOT) versus S1, oxaliplatin(SOX) in patients with locally advanced, resectable gastric/esophagogastric junction (EGJ) cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: Two arms, phase 3 study of neoadjuvant S1, oxaliplatin, and docetaxel (SLOT) versus S1, oxaliplatin(SOX) in patients with locally advanced, resectable gastric/esophagogastric junction (EGJ) cancer. 380 Patients will be enrolled in this trial. The primary objective of this study is to determine the 5-year survival of the two arms.

arm_group.description: 4 cycles preoperative chemotherapy with Docetaxel+oxaliplatin+s1 . Gastric resection. 6 cycles adjuvant chemotherapy with sequential oxaliplatin+s1 or oxaliplatin+s1,then s1 for 6 months。
3 cycles preoperative chemotherapy with oxaliplatin+s1. Gastric resection. 4 cycles adjuvant chemotherapy with sequential oxaliplatin+s1

intervention.description: Docetaxel 60mg/m2 was administered on day 1 of every 14 days.oxaliplatin 85 mg/m2 was administered on day 2 every 14 days. 40-60 mg of oral S-1 according to body-surface area twice a day was given for 10 days every 14 days .
oxaliplatin 100 mg/m2 on day 1 every 21 days.40-60 mg of oral S-1 according to body-surface area twice a day was given for 2 weeks every 21 days .
